name: 夏洛特·麦基
introduction: Charlotte McKee-Kowall was born on November 6th in Boston, Massachusetts, USA. She is an actress and model, known for her various television roles. She is the daughter of renowned scientist and Time 100 Most Influential People of 2018, Dr. Ann McKee. Charlotte says she has loved acting since the age of four and has known she wanted to pursue it as a career since her first camp musical.- IMDb Mini Biography By: Management
